（グリムジョー）
俺が 斬魄刀 解放しようとすると
google_translated: When I try to release a sword

en_text: Who should I get to interfere with him next?
jp_text:
フフッ…
次は誰にジャマさせようかな
google_translated:
Fufu ...
Who would you like to jam?
